strapiPost.title: Your Weekend Roundup
strapiPost.content:
Happy Friday! You know the drill - here is your Weekend Roundup with events and happenings in NWA that we'd recommend checking out...

  • Shaw Family Park: The grand opening and ribbon cutting for this new park is tomorrow morning. There will be coffee, food trucks, snow cones, and plenty of fun for the kids. Learn more here.
  • U-Pick Season: Find out where you can handpick berries this weekend in NWA here.
  • WOZ Flagship Ride: Join Women of OZ on their monthly Flagship Ride this Saturday. You can find more info here.
  • Osage Park: Soft opening of Osage Park in Bentonville is Saturday. We HIGHLY recommend stopping by this amazing spot.
  • Tontitown Farmers Market: Saturday marks the beginning of the 5th year for Tontitown's market.
  • S2S: To help kick off May Bike Month, the multi-city Square 2 Square ride is this Saturday.

Let us know what you're doing this weekend by sending us a note on IG, here. See ya out there!
